info.name: Dark Flat Minimal Thunderbird [BOOM:Bird]
info.description: It's dark, it's flat, it's minimal. You'll love it!
info.additionalInfo:
Personally i prefere mutt, but hey. What else can i do. Some people insist to send HTML mails only.

This is an extended dark version of chrissi4u's "Chris' CLEAN ADAPTION no1". Basically, I just made it dark and moved some items around.

To get the result, you see in the screenshot follow these steps:
* Drag items around (view -> toolbars -> customize)
* Add remove columns inside thread panel (right click column header)
* Hide all toolbars (view -> toolbars)

Don't give up. I know you can make it. After all you managed it to install this theme.

To get the icons working:
1. download the .zip from here: https://github.com/ganifladi/thunderbird
2. extract it
3. place chrome dir inside thunderbird profile dir
